html:
3.12.23  8:05 pm   Can you give us an audio journal from 10 years ago today?

      sure

3.12.23  7:52 pm   i noticed in one of your more recent videos the characters have like, dots above their heads. Whats with that?

      style

3.12.23  7:31 pm   What daw do you use? I figure that since I want to seriously start writing and producing songs, I need top of the line software, used by a top of the line person.

      i think that's a terrible idea. i recall trying to start on top-of-the-line software and it was crippling and i wasted at least 5 years being confused about it. if your software is too far ahead of yourself, you won't be able to feel yourself, nor find yourself. you can get intimidated and confused, and maybe give up. eventually i figured out that i needed to start with something hilariously simple, so i could feel like i was a little more in charge. i'm just trying to save you the trouble and confusion, and get straight to what really works

3.12.23  6:37 pm   Why was "home from work" originally called "here's the reason you can't write songs @ home, cause there's no limit to the amount of time you could or could not stay there"?

      i must have been feeling the limitations of limitlessness

3.12.23  6:22 pm   Do u like frogs?

      i accept them

3.12.23  4:26 pm   how it is your notes are so jazzyy?

      nothing is jazzy. don't worry about it

3.12.23  1:16 pm   what is the best kinda chord progression in your opinion?

      hold down 1 note forever

3.12.23  1:16 pm   should i write a song about an evil frog under someones bed named grog (the person and grog are friends)

      sure, but don't post about it online or someone else may do it first

3.12.23  12:44 pm   Say you have g b d with bass in c. When would you call it G/C as opposed to Csus2maj7

      call it G/C when you are confident that your reader can understand that. call it Csus2maj7 if you are not confident that your reader can understand G/C. .... If you are confident that your reader can understand both, i'd say you might as well use G/C because it takes way less space on the page

3.12.23  12:04 pm   should I mail some soap or e-mail some of it?

     no

     or perhaps I should eat it?

     no

     (wouldn't be the first time) thanks!

3.12.23  11:19 am   How do you pronounce "controversial"?

Con-tro-ver-see-ul?

Or

Con-tro-ver-shul? 

      that depends how deep into the royal palace you were when you learned your english

3.12.23  11:16 am   tell me ways to earn money

      invent something everyone needs

3.12.23  9:42 am   favorite book?

      if you can make one thicker than its height, then you've got my attention

3.12.23  5:46 am   are you my friend?

      could happen

3.12.23  1:22 am   what is your stance on parmesan cheese?

      neutral

3.11.23  10:52 pm   i just bought 9 pairs of headphones , which one should i use

      if you are a music creator, use the ones that are the most popular. if you are not a music creator, use the ones that are the least popular

3.11.23  10:38 pm   why is blue

      for you

3.11.23  10:20 pm   i never really tried to comprehend music as a kid so i developed absolute pitch and relied solely on that and now i still have bad relative pitch. for example in choir if the sheet music is in a different key from what we're actually singing in, i get really slow at reading the music. how can i stop thinking about absolute pitch to get more fluent at relative pitch which i know is the actually important one? also i hate when people think having absolute pitch equals talent, but then i'm still happy that i get to annoy my friends by naming the pitch of the microwave or the car honk or something,

      i've never been in your exact situation, but i think there's good news here. absolute pitch is just about impossible to develop after age 6. relative pitch, however, does not seem to have this hard limitation. so at least you don't have to worry that you missed the bus entirely on this. here's a clever suggestion: what if you somehow sabotage all the absolute notions of the note letters. for example, just transpose your keyboard or something. here's an even better idea actually, ...... hold your left hand on the pitch bend wheel and move it back and forth in a very small range slowly, while playing things with your right hand. maybe linger around just one or 2 notes, and mash the pitch around, tenderly, as if trying to scratch an itch. follow what makes you feel good. this may unlock some doors for you

3.11.23  8:28 pm   why can't we undo our mistakes in the real world? or better yet, why can we undo our mistakes on computers?

      in both cases, you can undo some mistakes and not others. there are plenty of undoable and non-undoable actions, both in comuters and outside of computers

3.11.23  7:33 pm   how do you stop caring about what others think and do what you want?

     start by figuring out what you want

      how do you even know what you want?

     you want a pony

3.11.23  7:14 pm   how do you feel about music theory

      you can try to make a theory about music, but music will always evade the theory. this is how you know it's working

3.11.23  4:42 pm   is the concept of being one continuous individual overrated

      no

3.11.23  4:37 pm   can music end war?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.11.23  3:39 pm   how to not hesitate doing your thing when ppl are around ?

      demonstrate the thing to those ppl

3.11.23  1:06 pm   At what point are words just arbitrary sounds being made.

      this is called the poa (point of arbitration)

3.11.23  11:42 am   do you ever just scroll on your phone for hours and hours with the time going by at the speed of light and then when you suddenly get self aware and you say to yourself "I should get productive" and then when you do get productive you start scrolling again and the cycle continues until you sleep?

      the problem here is the edges of the screen. if the screen had no edges, then you wouldn't have to scroll. you'd be able to see all the content readily

3.11.23  11:05 am   thoughts on python?

      too good. don't use

     no

      no

3.11.23  6:55 am   Give me a cool chord progression

      CG

3.11.23  3:02 am   do you respect people who sit on thrones?

      i respect the people who make the thrones

      maybe just a little, but not enough to put it on my resumé

      yes, but, on that note, i have also succeeded at reading it sometimes

3.11.23  1:01 am   do you like music

      it's ok

3.11.23  12:42 am   I'm high for the first time in my life and also reading your question page and it seems to make a lot more sense than usual and also I'm able to swim into the page and around with the words. I feel like I can ask you some more important question since I have slowed down time but I also can't think of anything to ask you.

      how about going for a walk

3.10.23  11:46 pm   how do i make my parents proud of me?

      first things first, how are you gonna become proud of yourself

3.10.23  9:39 pm   does your animation software crash a lot

      no

3.10.23  8:58 pm   How did you come up with the way you make your videos, with all the visuals and what not. It looks so cool and i love it!

      basically i think of 10,000 ways to make videos, and then unfortunately i realize that all of those ways are impossible. then, after calming down a bit, i realize that there might actually be 1 possible way. and i do it that way

3.10.23  8:47 pm   thoughts on math and physics in relation to music?

      math and physics, whether the artist knows it or not, provides the blank canvas on which the artist can deliver the payload: the non-predictable non-calculable goods known as the 'life'

3.10.23  7:50 pm   i'm afraid to go outside. how do i combat this?

      ask other people to tell you dazzling stories of the outside

3.10.23  5:43 pm   how do you un-do doing a bad thing?

      play it safe, just un-do everything

3.10.23  4:29 pm   I now realize that i may sometimes build an idea of who someone is by who they said they are and conpletely disregard the fact that people change. Is having no idea of who someone may be at any time the way?

      it might be nice to hover at the tipping point, knowing how they've been while also being equally open to change

3.10.23  2:02 pm   If someone asks you a question like "aren't you going to unload the car?" Does yes or no mean I'm not going to

      best to be specific with "yes i am", or "no i'm not". but, looking a bit further, i was wondering whether you are going to unload some items out of the car, or, unload the car off of a larger item such as a flat bed tow truck or some other car carrying device

3.10.23  1:49 pm   are you a real person i do not believe you are a real person but then again are any of us real in the first place

     sure

      are stars even real i've never seen a star up close so i wouldn't know but maybe they are but that doesnt explain what a human being is

     right. human beings are probably too difficult to fully explain, but, still real. otherwise the word real itself would have to be fake, which would make the word fake fake by extension, which it couldn't be, without itself

     cats could probably speak perfect english but they are probably too lazy to what do you think about this?

     i think that's not true. you need a more intricate mouth and tongue, at least

3.10.23  12:34 pm   I got a scented aromatozer thing for tje car and it feels like a special day

      each day will be gradually less special. until you get a new fresh one, then it will be special again

3.10.23  11:58 am   how does one accomplish greatness?

      i don't know, but i wanna know how YOU are gonna do it

3.10.23  11:44 am   Sometimes I want to use words like defenestration in regular speech, but often it is like amnesia for the rest of my sentence, or people don't know what it means and then once they do they're like "yooo there's a word for that?". Do you think it will always be this way or will it eventually just become a word people can use without making people forget the rest of the sentence?

      it's not gonna be a word people use. it's a word people talk about. that's the reason the amnesia occurs: the subject just changed, to talking about that word. it's as if someone took the previous subject and threw it out the window or something

3.10.23  9:50 am   hi bill

      hi

3.10.23  8:11 am   Am I oKaY/???/

      yes

      phrase it in the form of a statement
